page.title: 10A DAY IN THE LIFE OF RACHEL
page.content: I get up at{six a.m.}and I make mum a cup of tea. I have my breakfast. I go into the bathroom and get washed and clean my teeth.I get dressed then I make my sandwiches for school and I put them in my bag.I put my coat on , say goodbye to mum and walk to school. When the bell goes I go inside and go into the hall for assembly. After that I do some Maths. Playtime lasts a quarter of an hour.Next I do some English.Dinner is at{midday,}after which I go out to play. At{one thirty I come in. I do some knitting and after afternoon playtime I do some colouring. At{three forty-five}I go home. I watch television and I have my tea. I go out to play until{half past {seven,}then I go and watch television in bed. I switch it off and go to sleep at{nine p.m. }
